nodes.label: CSWR Embedding Model
nodes.description: CSWR uses the all-MiniLM-L6-v2 embedding model with 384-dimensional vectors and cosine similarity scoring. This is the production model used since v1.0.

nodes.label: CSWR Factual Accuracy
nodes.description: CSWR achieves 94-98% factual accuracy on hard datasets, with near-zero hallucinations even on edge chunks. This represents a 40-60% reduction in error rate versus standard top-k RAG.

nodes.label: System Agent Count
nodes.description: The Neuro-Symbolic Swarm system runs 7 concurrent agent generations per query. These include specialized agents for retrieval, fusion, critique, safety, decomposition, memory, and generation orchestration.

nodes.label: FusionEnv Observation Space
nodes.description: The FusionEnv gymnasium environment uses an observation space of Box(shape=(396,), dtype=float32), consisting of 384 embedding dimensions plus 12 engineered features.

nodes.label: Expected System Latency
nodes.description: Expected query latency is 10-60 seconds per turn depending on GPU capability. Design priority is correctness over speed. This is a deep reasoning engine, not a conversational chatbot.

nodes.label: CSWR 8-Phase Pipeline
nodes.description: CSWR uses an 8-phase pipeline: query decomposition, vector search with CSWR scaffold, local stability and question-fit and drift scoring, stability context packs, answerability filtering, structured formatting, logging and metrics, and config-driven operation.
